activities: Information is typically received from clients of Vitech Systems Group for the purpose of migration to the database of the Equitrak product (clients purchase licenses for the Equitrak product from Vitech System Group for fund administration purposes).  These clients are usually banks, insurance companies and others organisations active in the financial services industry.  The information is typically provided in Microsoft Office files (such as Excel, Access and Word) and is then migrated to the Equitrak database.
